mapper.sql: uuid, user_uuid, energy_ball_uuid, in_or_out, point_change, status, created,rest_point
mapper.insert:
insert into point_trade_record ( uuid, user_uuid, energy_ball_uuid, in_or_out, point_change, status,
rest_point,
created ) values ( #{uuid}, #{userUuid}, #{energyBallUuid}, #{inOrOut}, #{pointChange}, #{status},
#{restPoint,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{created})
mapper.select: select sum(point_change) from point_trade_record where user_uuid=#{userUuid} and in_or_out=1 and status = 1 and created between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
select count(*) from point_trade_record where user_uuid = #{userUuid};

select U.uuid as uuid, U.user_uuid as user_uuid, U.point_change as point, U.created as created, U.in_or_out as in_or_out, B.created as walk_ball_created, B.step_num as step_num, A.source_uuid as source_uuid, T.source_name as source_name, T.type as type from point_trade_record U left outer join energy_point_ball A on U.energy_ball_uuid = A.uuid left outer join walk_ball B on A.uuid = B.uuid left outer join activity T on A.source_uuid = T.uuid where U.user_uuid = #{userUuid} and U.in_or_out = 1 order by U.created desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select uuid,user_uuid,point_change as point,created,in_or_out from point_trade_record where user_uuid=#{userUuid} and in_or_out=0 order by created desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select U.uuid as uuid, U.user_uuid as user_uuid, U.point_change as point, U.created as created, U.in_or_out as in_or_out, B.created as walk_ball_created, B.step_num as step_num, A.source_uuid as source_uuid, T.source_name as source_name, T.type as type from point_trade_record U left outer join energy_point_ball A on U.energy_ball_uuid = A.uuid left outer join walk_ball B on A.uuid = B.uuid left outer join activity T on A.source_uuid = T.uuid where U.user_uuid = #{userUuid} order by U.created desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select U.uuid as uuid, U.user_uuid as user_uuid, U.power_change as power_change, U.created as created, U.in_or_out as in_or_out, T.source_name as source_name, T.type as type, T.uuid as source_uuid from power_trade_record U left outer join energy_power_ball A on U.energy_ball_uuid = A.uuid left outer join activity T on A.source_uuid = T.uuid where U.user_uuid = #{userUuid} order by U.created desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
